resources.string:
What is MediCure?

MediCure is more than just an app. It is a virtual health companion on the go. Designed by a dedicated team of doctors and computer scientists, It gives you the best symptom assessment available. Building up a detailed picture of your health over time, MediCure provides you with an accurate understanding of what is going on and helps you decide on next steps to take. You can use MediCure whenever, wherever and always for free.

MediCure for everyone.

Applying technology to improve healthcare for everyone is why we exist. Our technology improves access to healthcare, allowing you to take control of your health. We believe that everyone has a right to information about their health. Our services are designed to be personalized and easily accessible to everyone across the world, regardless of their knowledge or available technology.

Ease & effectiveness

We believe timely access to the right health information can revolutionize healthcare and help save lives. We strive to deliver accurate, evidence based information that is easy to understand.
